Getting started with the **networkreporting** package
====================================================

Installation
------------
You can install the package from CRAN. 

For the time being, the most up-to-date, development version of
the package will be available on [github](http://www.github.com/dfeehan). 
The easiest way to do so is to use the
**devtools** package:

```{r}
## require(devtools)

## install_github('dfeehan/networkreporting@dev')
```
